name: Heart beat
description:
What did you do on New year's eve? Some people danced.

Click & drag the character to record some SICK DANCE MOVES.
Fill the nightclub with some FIRE HOT DANCING!

This is my entry for the Weekly hour jam, made in a bit more than one hour, oops!
I will probably make a better version soon.

The music is Heartbeat by Nathalie.
